text:
*R Contribution Working Group Planned dates for WG meetings in 2025*

Bimonthly meeting at 15:00 London time
Jan 24 (moved from Jan 17 to give more notice), Mar 21, May 16, Jul 17, Sep 26 (moved from Sep 19 due to posit::conf), Nov 21

Bimonthly meeting at 19:30 London time
Feb 18, Apr 15, Jan 17, Aug 19, Oct 21, Dec 16

I've sent calendar invites for each series to the <https://stat.ethz.ch/mailman/listinfo/r-contribution-wg|R-Contribution-WG mailing list> and you'll get a couple of extra ones for the dates I've already shifted - check your junk mail etc if you don't see it.

Alternatively, you can use the following:
 - Google calendar: <https://calendar.google.com/calendar/u/0/r?cid=nc4tg39nam44itn9uhnf751hbk@group.calendar.google.com>
 - iCalendar (ics): <https://calendar.google.com/calendar/ical/nc4tg39nam44itn9uhnf751hbk%40group.calendar.google.com/public/basic.ics>
 - R Contributor Event Calendar, using the link in the footer of the calendar to set your time zone: <https://contributor.r-project.org/events/>

I'll aim to send a reminder each month as usual, this serves as the one for January, where we can discuss
 - Plans for R Dev Days in 2025
 - Plans for GSoC 2025
 - Updates on translation work
and any other business - feel free to add to the agenda: <https://hackmd.io/@hturner/HyISuE97D/edit>
